derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek, literally something new', neuter of the adjective neos

entry.def: Neon lights or signs are made from glass tubes filled with neon gas which produce a bright electric light.

example.ex: In the city squares the neon lights flashed in turn.
example.tran: 在城市广场上，霓虹灯依次闪烁。

example.ex: ...neon slogans which light up the city by night.
example.tran: 夜晚照亮整个城市的霓虹灯广告

entry.def: Neon is a gas which occurs in very small amounts in the atmosphere.

example.tran: 像氖和氩这样的惰性气体

means.word_mean: 1. a colorless odorless gaseous element that give a red glow in a vacuum tube; one of the six inert gasses; occurs in the air in small amounts
